name: Shrimp mousse (Mousse de Crevettes)
recipeIngredient: Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Put the shrimp and egg into the container of a food processor. Add salt, pepper, cayenne and nutmeg. Blend to a fine puree.

With the motor on, gradually add the cream. Test the seasonings by dropping a teaspoon of the mousse mixture into a little boiling salted water. Cook until it is slightly firm. Drain and taste. If desired, add more seasonings.
